programme.title: Looking for Paradise
programme.desc: Inspired by Vite di uomini non illustri by Giuseppe Pontiggia and directed by Mario Monicelli, this film follows Claudia Bertelli, born in Milan in 1949 to a middle-class family. Educated in England, Claudia's life unfolds through diverse roles: rebellious single mother, feminist, wife, doctor in developing countries, and finally a mystical nun. Each phase reflects changing ideals, forming a portrait of a woman exploring identity across different stages of her life.

programme.title: Murder Obsession
programme.desc: Michael Stanford, a promising young actor, suffers from the stress caused by his job. Fatigue creates large gaps in his memory and makes him unstable character-wise. Therefore, Michael decides to retreat to his mother's house, inviting the entire film crew as well.

programme.title: Scalps
programme.desc: The commander of a Texan fort in the Civil War tries to buy the local Indian tribe chief's daughter. The noble squaw manages to escape, and hides out with a rough rancher, who dislikes Indians, but hates the Southerners more.

programme.title: Play Motel
programme.desc: A secluded motel becomes the center of a web of mysteries and criminal activity.

programme.title: Who Finds a Friend Finds a Treasure
programme.desc: Alan, a gambler, drains his uncle's savings and takes refuge on Charlie's boat, on a cruise. They shipwreck on an island, defend a tribe from pirates and discover a Japanese fort with treasure. In the end, the money turns out to be fake and Alan forgets a diamond idol, later exhibited in a museum where they are both hired as labourers.

programme.title: Cinque per l'inferno
programme.desc: Cinque per l'inferno features five men caught in a dangerous mission against sinister forces.

programme.title: Kidnap Syndicate
programme.desc: Based on an actual event "The Kidnap Syndicate" is the story of two boys, one from a rich family and the other from a poor family, who are kidnapped and held for ransom.

programme.title: Come niente
programme.desc: Sixteen-year-old Greta and 11-year-old Caterina, spend the summer with their grandfather Franco, who survived a major earthquake in central Italy.

programme.title: Stunt Squad
programme.desc: In the city of Bologna, the dangerous bandit Valli, with his group, runs an extortion racket by terrorizing merchants. On the gang's trail comes Police Commissioner Grifi, kicking off a long hunt for the extortionists and murderers.

programme.title: Play Motel
programme.desc: A secluded motel becomes the center of a web of mysteries and criminal activity.

programme.desc: Alan, a gambler, drains his uncle's savings and takes refuge on Charlie's boat, on a cruise. In the end, the money turns out to be fake and Alan forgets a diamond idol, later exhibited in a museum where they are both hired as labourers.
